modName: Ebony Armor more revealing by Tool
descriptionHtml: All is my own work. Cuirass will work with any retexture mod as it uses the vanilla, I have added Alpha property\'s although I am not using them. The helmet has a rib that would need to be retextured to fit a new texture mod, the rest of the helmet uses the vanilla. Again, all armor has alpha property\'s although I am not using them, did this to be more mod friendly.
author: Tool

files.name: Old file version- see desciption for link to new
files.fileName: Old file version- see desciption for link to new-6985.zip
